              <div class="baoliao-block"> <p itemprop="description">京东38女神节Apple全线产品，送她「新机」好礼，<span style="color: rgb(187, 2, 0);"><strong>指定iPhone15到手价4849元起</strong></span><strong>，</strong><span class="face">&nbsp;</strong></span>部分信用卡分期还可享受满减优惠。<span style="color: rgb(187, 2, 0);"><strong>页面还有多张Apple产品大额优惠券，领券下单更便宜</strong></span><strong><img itemprop="image" alt="京东Apple                             <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-textarea">

                                        <a class="jubao" href="javascript:void(0);" id="report_297875051" style="display:inline-block">举报</a>

                                        <!-- 删除 -->

                                </div>
                            </div>

                                    <input type="hidden" name="parentid" value="297876458">
                                    <textarea name="content" placeholder="回复给qwjp"></textarea>
                                </form>

                                                        <a class="jubao" href="javascript:void(0);" id="report_297911080" style="display:inline-block">举报</a>
                                                        <!-- 踩评论功能 -->
                                                        <a class="caiNum" href="javascript:void(0);" id="cdc_oppose_297911080" data-item="3, 0, 297911080, 106248143, 297911080">踩评论<span>(0)</span></a>
                                                        <!-- 删除 -->
                                                                                                            </div>
                                                </div>
                                            </div>
                                            <!-- 评论内容 -->
                                            <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-comment">
                                                <span>春节期间 4588 12期免息</span>
                                                <!-- radio_3_4 宽高比例3:4 -->
                                                <!-- data-radio值 0 4:3，  1 1:1，  2 3:4 -->
                                                                                                                                                                                            </div>
                                            <!-- 用户信息 及点赞操作 -->
                                            <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-info">
                                                <div>

                                                        <span>安徽</span>
                                                                                                    </div>
                                                <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-info-child">

<div class="aside-right" id="feed-side">
    <!--顶部  爆料  share模块 -->
    <div class="baoliao-box">
    <p class="txt">
        爆料是一件简单又好玩的事，动动手指就能把你认可的好价商品分享给千万值友，还能获得大量金币奖励，兑换礼品卡和值得买定制礼品！赶快行动起来吧！
        <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="J_check_video">点击观看视频吧~</a>
        <i class="J_check_video icon-video-o-thin"></i>
    </p>
        <div class="video">
        </div>
        <a href="https://www.smzdm.com/baoliao/" target="_blank" class="btn-go" onclick="dataLayer.push({'event':'1210013','name':'右侧爆料模块'})">我要爆料</a>
    <div class="rookie-award-container">
        <div class="J_rookie_award rookie-award">
            <span>爆料新人可获额外奖励</span>
            <i class="icon icon-info-mark-o-thin"></i>
            <div class="rookie-award-desc">
                <h5>新人奖励</h5>
                <p>前5篇发布银牌及以上层级爆料每篇奖励3金币，第6至10篇每篇奖励6金币。</p>
                <a href="https://post.smzdm.com/p/a25965xp/" target="_blank" onclick="dataLayer.push({'event': '1300006', 'ec': 'PC优惠详情页', 'ea': '详情页_爆料', 'el': 'tips超链点击', '文章id': '106248143', '文章标题': '京东Apple 38女神节，送她「新机」好礼，限时6期免息~', '文章频道': 'youhui'})">更多奖励机制详情请戳<i class="icon-sub icon-angle-right-o-thin"></i></a>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    </div>
